text:
I am testing jmeter-plugins with JMeter 3.2 and find some problem with Selenium Web Driver. 

This Driver use org.apache.jmeter.util.JSR223BeanInfoSupport.LANGUAGE_NAMES but now it is a private field. With IllegalAccessException will be fail to creating popupMenu in TestPlanGui.

Can you add a method that creates a copy of the array?

Thanks,
Artem
creator: artem.fedorov@blazemeter.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
